title: Ep. 851 Another Troubling Connection Surfaces
description:
Summary:
In this episode I address the growing backlash against the Amazon corporate welfare package. I also discuss new evidence of voter fraud surfacing in Florida. Finally, I address another deeply troubling connection in the spying operation against George Papadopoulos. 
 
News Picks:
Here’s the evidence that Barack Obama treated the press far worse than the Trump administration.
 
The federal government collected record tax revenue and still ran an enormous deficit. 
 
Was the Florida Democrat Party involved in an election scheme?
 
Are younger black voters finding a home in the Republican Party? 
 
The court has ruled that Hillary Clinton will have to answer questions about her email server under oath.
 
Jeff Flake shafts conservatives, again.
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
